title: HONOR PAC 2015 Annual Holiday Reception - "A Year of Equality and Commitment"
desc: At our Annual Holiday Reception "A Year of Equality and Commitment" Saturday, December 5, 2015 6:30 pm - 10:00 pm Join HONOR PAC's Board of Directors in this fun and joyous holiday celebration! ? This year's holiday gathering is hosted by Jon Wright and Eric Womac at their beautiful and historic ?Bent-Halstead House. ? Built in 1912, t he Ernest and Florence Bent Halstead House and Grounds is one of Los Angeles' Historic-Cultural Monument? designated in 1988 by the Los Angeles Cultural Heritage Commission as worthy of preservation based on architectural, historic and cultural criteria. Kindly Note: ?Due to the historic significance of the Bent-Halstead House, our hosts kindly request that high pointed heels not be worn. Ample street parking available on Marmion Way (one block away). Public transportation or ridesharing is encouraged.
